title: fix: pass date to Buffer staging steps
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Syncing the hive clock
gist.blurb: Fixed a date mismatch in our social bot so weekly updates land on time.
gist.summary: Updated the weekly social media publishing workflow to pass explicit dates, ensuring the publisher looks in the same directory as the generator.
gist.impact: Internal fix ensuring weekly digests are staged correctly to Buffer without manual intervention.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot adjusting a large pixelated calendar to sync dates. Represents fixing the date logic in the pipeline.
